chapter.title: Report over simulation of different bets on betfair
chapter.para: The purpose of this report is to see the outcome of simulations in a simple way. The simulations is of data collected/retrieved from Betfair and treats mainly Horse racing, winner and place markets.

This is the best-of version, the bets are the ones with the highest profit/avg(price) quote. This measurement is beleived to be a key indicator of the strength of the strategy. A high ratio means high profit and/or low risk.
